summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the corporation during that period.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the account held by Disco Scientia Corporation.

keyFacts: The bank statement covers the period from April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016.
The account number is 7433812307, associated with Disco Scientia Corporation.
The ending balance for the account on April 30, 2016, was $356.26.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was withdrawn on April 12, 2016.
The document indicates that the service charge was waived due to not meeting the balance criteria.
